desc: Dear community!We are a medium sized Austria based company, providing Security–solutions  and concepts, with a high number of employees. In order to simplify our working processes, we decidet to work with tailormade Apps. Of course, the developers of those Apps have to meet our standards. That`s why the idea of a general competition for freelancers came up. The commission is to develop a TEST-App with certain functions and some basic requirements. It will consist of two databases („my clients“ & „client“), a backend and it must be IOS compatible with a login function. There must be a feature for the assignment of jobs to employee-/user-groups and a feature for task/job-acceptance or rejection for the employees/users . The focus of the project is on the backend - so we need an experienced backend - developer with App skills.The best thing is, that there are no limits to your creativity! You only need to focus on using state of the art technologies and the development of secure architecture.The developer with the most efficient solution for the Test-App, will have the opportunity to be our programming-partner for much more extensive Apps in immediate future.Conditions of the challenge:•	The participant has to finish the app in time (within 2 days from order placement)•	The codes must be commented•	The requirements must be fullfilled•	Sourcecode must be providedIn Annex, you can find a detailed list of the TEST-App requirementsWe can´t wait to see our offers for that project!Your`s BFS Team
title: BACKEND with small App

desc: Detailed requirement is mentioned hereunder :We have a need to develop a mobile app + a website under BOOT Basis (Build, Own, Operate  Transfer), this electric mobility services business website + mobile app will enable lower income group people (those who earn monthly 10,000 Rs to 40,000 Rs) to have their own electric 2 wheeler scooter and/or 2 wheeler electric motorcycle/s. Motorcycles are made by our OEM Vendor (See : [url removed, login to view]) at Ahmedabad, Gujarat, Total estimated requirement of 2 Wheeler EVs in 1 Year at Ahmedabad = 12,000, In this proposed website & App, through GPS Tracker, besides real-time locational details, speed, distance travelled, we will need complete tracking about vehicle status in "Real Time". (Battery Status, Anti-theft device control in remote, vehicle remote lock facility so that we can lock and shut down the vehicle if the User does not pay).Electric Scooters are assembled by a Gujarat Based Supplier.We would also like to know/track all the available digital data from vehicle dash-board.We are a new startup and we are aiming to provide "electric mobility services" (Mobile App Only Service) to lower income group people having 10,000/-Rs to 40,000/-Rs monthly income and who have daily travel of more than 30 kilometers (in their job profile) and at present who are daily travelling 30 KM or more through a Petrol 2 Wheeler (either scooter or motorcycle).Our Electric Vehicle actual cost is between 50,000/-Rs to 55,000/-Rs, But through our proposed website & Mobile App, this electric vehicle will be available in just 6,000/-Rs only to the Users/Customers through a predetermined business process/strategy. There is a set methodology to do this! We use "Credit Worthiness" of the User & pursue an NBFC (non banking finance company, vehicle finance company) or banks to get 75% to 100% Finance for the Vehicle. This way, capital investment is getting reduced.The Electric Vehicle (Scooter & Motorcycle) has top speed of 48 KMPH, Range - 80 KM in 1 time Charge of Battery, Battery consumes 2 Units of Electricity, It takes 4 to 5 hours to charge the battery 100%. Vehicle can easily carry 2 adult people.If you are ready to the entire job (Website & Mobile App Development + O&M  Of Website + Diagnostics, Fault Resolution in real-time), we may pay you as per below :1) For each Registered Paid Mobile App User, we will pay 50/-Rs. We expect 12,000 Customers in the 1st Year & 25,000 Customers in 2nd Year, So, You can earn 6 Lac Rs in the First Year and 12.5 Lac Rs in Second Year.2) For each Registered Paid Clean Kilometers Trader, we will pay you 10/-Rs. We expect 1 Lac Clean Kilometers Traders in 1st Year and 5 Lac in Second Year, So, You will earn 10 Lac Rs in First Year and 50 Lac Rs in Second Year.This might become total 7 Lac Rs to 62 Lac Rs Project Order.The website and App is required to collect payment of 2/-Rs Per Kilometer Driven By Each Vehicle. Website & App will be used for Clean Kilometers trading as well.No Advance, No Upfront Payments, All development, hardware etc will be on your account. Server + Call Centre will required to be set up at our office, we will provide space and needed furniture. Minimum 2 seat customer support call centre (24 hours operational) needed. We can do this!You can visit me for demo of electric Vehicle (You can visit our factory to take test ride of electric motorcycle).Please don't reply if you're not ready to work as per the terms and conditions mentioned ahead, we would like not to be in wasteful communication and unnecessary negotiations!Have a nice day!​Regards,​
title: Electric Mobility Services Mobile App to be developed

desc: We are looking for a passionate and competent Unity game developer we like to partner for long term. This is just a test project. If we are satisfied with result, there are more real projects to come. We have two years worth of game projects so only apply if you can commit for long term.** About Project- It is an Pokemon Go-like AR game with similar camera view and setup- It is also a multiplayer network game (we prefer Photon or UNet for this)- You need to render a real-world map with proper street names using current GPS data- You will need to render a 3D avatar which is customizable.- These 3D avatars need to be downloaded separately from the app and display them properly (you can use Unity's asset bundle feature for this).- Player can customize these 3D avatar in customization screen.- Player can then log into the game and meet with other players' avatars (which they also customized according to their liking). Game must be able to display this properly.- Then they can move around, chat or perform some animations.- We will provide necessary graphic but you are expected to do some animation in Unity if required.Again, we are looking for partner who can commit long term, provide quality finishes and work quickly. Do not apply if you cannot commit for other projects from us (there will be a lot coming if we are satisfied with this project).
title: Pokemon Go-like 3D Android Game

desc: I need Xamarin Android application that will popup with window on each call.User will be able to click button in this window to accept/decline call.Of course you will need provide sources.Please put "I'm not a bot" at start of your bid.I need only stable prove of concept.I does not need this to publish in Google Play.I does not need this to have beauty UI.When incoming call coming app must show to user custom UI form with:1. Accept/reject buttons, must accept and reject call, accordingly.2. Few lines of text with different fonts/bolds3. Image (photo)On incoming call default system window must NOT appear. Only one popup on incoming call.When call dropped/rejected window must disappear.When call accepted window must disappear and user must see default calling app.Budget is 100USD. Time to make - few days. Up to week. If you are EXPERIENCED Xamarin developer - no big deal to make it for you, and you could make it in one day.All things are easy, need just combine it[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]PS: If you could do same (based on Xamarin) for iPhone and Windows Phone - I will extend project for these too.
title: Xamarin Android call hook application.

title: Miss Call logger

desc: I need to build a mobile app to manage the waiting list for my restaurant, this app should have two interfaces (customer and staff). It should provide below functions (minimum):- Create new record on the waiting list for a walk-in customer with basic info (no of parties, section, indoor/outdoor, name, mobile number).- Receive a request to be on the waiting list from VIP customers, so they can put a request while they are on the way driving to the restaurant.- The app should have an interface about the availability of all the tables, average waiting time, and status of each customer waiting for the record.- The app should send a notification when the table is ready, and the customer can see the  average waiting time- The app should keep the history, and able to generate the report from the historical information.- The identity of the restaurant should be included, the design should be easy and friendly for customer and staff.I am open to any other idea to improve the app,Regards,Musaad
title: Mobile App for Restaurant Waiting List

desc: I need an iPhone app. I already have a design for it, I just need it to be built.Simple single view ui1. First it shows ten gifs fetched from tenor2. When u click search button, search barbappears3.  When u type and press return or press search butt, should fetch ten related gifs with that search text from tenor4. When u scroll down, should add ten more gifs for same search textRequires to do in swift 4(swift 3 can be considered).Should do the fetch and populate eith rxswift,rxcocoa,rxalamofireShould use good ui ethics, loading indicators, navigationsShould use good programming guidelines, clean and commented codeNote: This is a small part of a project of android built app and this is to get a ios developer who can do reactive programming with rxswift,rxcocoa. Budget is a 30usd must since im only looking for a ios dev for my big project
title: IOS Gif search, lazy load, tenor api
